titleStmt.title: To the memory of my most honoured friend Sir Jonas Moore, Knight, late surveyor general of His Majesties ordnance and armories.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Harford, at the Angel in Corn-hill,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "NAture first rul'd the World by Laws unknown ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
